info.title: Job Posting API
info.description: A listing that describes a job opening in a certain organization.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Keyword search for item

parameters.name: additionaltype
parameters.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the \'typeof\' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

parameters.name: alternatename
parameters.description: An alias for the item.

parameters.name: basesalary
parameters.description: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.

parameters.name: dateposted
parameters.description: Publication date for the job posting.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A short description of the item.

parameters.name: educationrequirements
parameters.description: Educational background needed for the position.

parameters.name: employmenttype
parameters.description: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).

parameters.name: experiencerequirements
parameters.description: Description of skills and experience needed for the position.

parameters.name: hiringorganization
parameters.description: Organization offering the job position.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

parameters.name: incentivecompensation
parameters.description: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job. Supersedes incentives.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: The industry associated with the job position.

parameters.name: jobbenefits
parameters.description: Description of benefits associated with the job. Supersedes benefits.

parameters.name: joblocation
parameters.description: A (typically single) geographic location associated with the job position.

parameters.name: mainentityofpage
parameters.description: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described.            See background notes for details.       Inverse property: mainEntity.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the item.

parameters.name: occupationalcategory
parameters.description: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.

parameters.name: potentialaction
parameters.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an \'object\' role.

parameters.name: qualifications
parameters.description: Specific qualifications required for this role.

parameters.name: responsibilities
parameters.description: Responsibilities associated with this role.

parameters.name: salarycurrency
parameters.description: The currency (coded using ISO 4217, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.

parameters.name: sameas
parameters.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item\'s identity. E.g. the URL of the item\'s Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

parameters.name: skills
parameters.description: Skills required to fulfill this role.

parameters.name: specialcommitments
parameters.description: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the job.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the item.

parameters.name: workhours
parameters.description: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item
